sentences.en: Bite a dove's head off ( substitute for any form of fowl ).
sentences.cn: 咬掉一只鸽子的脑袋 ( 可用其他禽类替代 ).

sentences.en: Domestic chickens are descended from jungle fowl of Southeast Asia.
sentences.cn: 家鸡是由东南亚原鸡演变而来的。

sentences.en: fowl such as turkeys and ducks
sentences.cn: 诸如火鸡和鸭之类的家禽

sentences.en: He wrenched the fowl's head off.
I could match my cousin Jasper's game - cock maturity with a sturdier fowl.
sentences.cn: 我可以象斗鸡一样,用一只更强壮的种鸡斗败我堂兄的公鸡,斗败他的世故老成.

sentences.en: I could match my cousin's game - cock with a sturdier fowl.
sentences.cn: 我可以用一只更强壮的种鸡斗败我堂兄的公鸡.

sentences.en: In the scow the cowering fowl scowled at the howling owl.
sentences.cn: 在平底驳船里,畏缩的家禽对嚎叫的猫头鹰面露不悦.

sentences.en: It is a fowl which needs to be carved.
Pasturage breed aquatics basically has pig, ox, sheep and fowl.
sentences.cn: 畜牧养殖主要有猪 、 牛 、 羊和家禽.

sentences.en: Since my heart attack, I've eaten more fish and fowl and less red meat.
sentences.cn: 自从我患了心脏病后, 我就多吃鱼肉和禽肉,少吃红色肉类.

sentences.en: The hen in fowl run lays in contemporaneity, egg size is identical.
sentences.cn: 养鸡场里的母鸡在同一时期下蛋, 鸡蛋大小完全相同.

sentences.en: This proposal is neither fish nor fowl. I can't tell what you're proposing.
sentences.cn: 这个建议不伦不类, 我 真 说不出你在提些什么.

sentences.en: We had a roast fowl for dinner.
When I started to wrap up the fowl, she came in.
sentences.cn: 我正要把光鸡包起来, 她就进来了.

trans.tran_en: a bird, such as a chicken, that is kept for its meat and eggs, or the meat of this type of bird
